fields.title: My order hasn't arrived yet?
fields.customer_answer: Attached to your dispatch order is a tracking number. You can track where your order is through the courier provided by the website.. If you can't track your order please get in touch with us.

fields.title: What if my watch is delivered broken?
fields.customer_answer: If you suspect your item is faulty please contact us by email: flywatch@flywatch.com.

fields.title: Do you sell second hand watches ?
fields.customer_answer: We only sell brand new watches.

fields.title: Can I pay by cheque?
fields.customer_answer: No. We only sell our products with credit cards.
